official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, a legal public holiday.

summary.text: Designates the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, as a legal public holiday. Provides that such day shall be observed on the third Monday in January.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to make the birthday of Martin Luther King, Junior, a legal public holiday.
